site.name: Handyman Zach
site.tagline: Professional Handyman Services in the Hudson Valley
site.description: Professional handyman services in Saugerties, Kingston, Woodstock, and Catskill. From mounting and bike repair to lawn services and deck repair, we handle it all with quality and reliability.

services.name: Mounting Services
services.description: Professional mounting and installation services for TVs, shelves, artwork, and more. Secure and level installations guaranteed.

services.name: Bike Repair
services.description: Complete bicycle repair and maintenance services. From tune-ups to major repairs, get your bike running smoothly again.

services.name: Lawn Services
services.description: Comprehensive lawn care including mowing, trimming, edging, and seasonal maintenance to keep your property looking its best.

services.name: Gardening
services.description: Expert gardening services including planting, pruning, landscaping, and garden maintenance to enhance your outdoor space.

services.name: Deck Repair
services.description: Professional deck repair, maintenance, and restoration services. From loose boards to complete refinishing.

services.name: Painting
services.description: Interior and exterior painting services with attention to detail. Quality paints and professional techniques for lasting results.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Zach did an amazing job repairing our deck. He was professional, punctual, and the work quality was outstanding. Our deck looks brand new!

testimonials.name: Mike Chen
testimonials.text: Perfect TV mounting service! Zach was careful with our walls and made sure everything was level and secure. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Lisa Rodriguez
testimonials.text: Zach transformed our garden completely. His attention to detail and knowledge of plants really shows. Our yard has never looked better.

testimonials.name: David Thompson
testimonials.text: Quick and professional bike repair service. Zach fixed my bike's brakes and gears perfectly. Will definitely use his services again.
